summary: A Keras training callback that automatically saves model checkpoints to a local directory and synchronizes them with a Hugging Face Hub repository according to a configurable save strategy (e.g., each epoch or a fixed number of steps). It can also upload the associated tokenizer and manage authentication, optionally storing full training state for later resumption.
business_intent: Enable seamless, automated publishing of trained models to the Hugging Face Hub during training, supporting versioned model distribution and easy downstream loading.
